name: Wind Rider
loreDescription: Famously known as the Phantom Wind, Rinak would sneak into the mansions of the rich with ghost-like stealth and vanish with their most expensive possessions.

skillDescription.base: Casts stealth and increases Attack by 30.0% for 1 turn when the enemy is defeated.
skillDescription.max: Casts stealth and increases Attack by 60.0% for 1 turn when the enemy is defeated.
